lead_paragraph: Brazil advanced to the Copa América final yesterday, eliminating Uruguay, 5-4, on penalty kicks in Maracaibo, Venezuela.Brazil advances to meet the winner of today’s semifinal between Mexico and Argentina.The score was tied at 2-2 after regulation. Gilberto converted to put Brazil in front, 5-4, in penalty kicks, and goalie Doni clinched the victory by stopping Diego Lugano’s shot.
